body.name: Hanes Women's Panties Pack, Smoothing Microfiber No-Show Underwear, 6-Pack (Colors May Vary)
features: VALUE YOU LOVE – This Hanes women’s panties pack comes with 6 smoothing thongs for women.
QUALITY FABRIC – Our Hanes women’s underwear pack is made from smooth microfiber (87% polyester/13% spandex). And the comfortable panty liner is made from soft cotton.
SMOOTHING, NO ROLL WAISTBAND – For comfort, control, and a toned look around your waist, which we know you'll love.
COMFORT THAT LASTS – Our experts designed these women's underwear thongs with a smooth microfiber design that stretches to move with you.
NO TAG, NO ITCH – Each thong has a tagless design because who has time for scratchy tags?
NO PANTY LINES – Feel confident knowing that these smoothing thongs are practically invisible under your clothes.
body.description: Sleek and smooth, cool and comfortable are just some of the adjectives that describe Hanes®' best microfiber briefs. These stretchy brief panties offer gentle control at your waist and tummy. They're made with Hanes® moisture-wicking fabric that keeps you cool and dry all day. Made in a classic high-rise brief silhouette with a full-coverage back, creating a sleek, smooth look that disappears under even clingy clothes so you won't have to worry about panty lines. Even more comfort comes from the smoothing, no-roll waistband. One more detail of comfort is the soft cotton-lined gusset. These essential briefs for women are available in a convenient 6-pack of assorted colors for easy stocking up.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #4,471 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #230 in Women's G-Strings & Thongs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommended size too big but good quality
reviews.reviewText: I ordered size 7 as recommended and when I pulled one out and saw how big it looked put it right back in the package. I didn't even have to try them on and immediately did the return/exchange for size 6 medium which I typically wear. I will say they are good quality.UPDATE: I received the size 6 (which I exchanged the 7s for) and they fit perfectly. They have 13% spandex but are not super snug so if you only have some looseness in the belly area, they will work fine. But if you have a big belly that you're calling a gut, don't expect a miracle to flatten it. You'll need to go the route of exercise. LOL They are comfortable and don't seem like they will ride up or roll down on the tummy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color selection. And fit.
reviews.reviewText: The color selection is very good, The fit is excellent. Fabric is smooth and soft. The cut on the back behind is spacious. No riding up... very comfortable fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product is exactly as described

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ok, I accidentally bought this specific pack of skivvies. When I received them, I was a bit surprised because A. It was the actual same day I ordered them and B. Not what I thought I ordered since I was expecting cotton vs microfiber. Well... C. These things smoothed out my, uh, how do I say, "what was baby belly skin after I had babies 18 years ago but since it's skin and not muscle it's not going anywhere without surgery belly" belly looks SO GOOD. Like, it was the birthday gift to myself I didn't know I wanted (my birthday is tomorrow). Obviously I don't actually want microfiber on its own for my birthday but I'll definitely wear it under a really cute outfit for sure.It feels good. No allergies to the material. No hidden sweat; no itching to the waist or unpleasant feelings at all. They're really comfortable and I've had them on all day.No idea on washability yet but I plan on pinning them into a pillow case on a gentle wash and gentle dry. I don't want to shrink them. I bought them on a size 10 for 248 lbs (sheesh I told the internet my weight) but the fit is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I FINALLY FOUND THE PERFECT PANTIES
reviews.reviewText: I have been searching for the perfect underwear for a couple of years. First and foremost, I want no panty lines. Other wants are full coverage, high rise but not too high rise and light compression soft & they don't look like granny panties. These check all of my boxes. I normally wear a 7 but followed the recommend on the sizing and was happy I went with the 6. I say give them a try if you too have been searching for the perfect panty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay but still not what I need
reviews.reviewText: These panties are okay. They are tea high waisted, sometimes higher than my pants! I like how they are supposed to give a slimming look but the midline stitching creates a weird indent in an unflattering way. If you’re wearing something tight and using these to provide a slimming look, I’d go with something different. Otherwise, they are comfortable and the overall quality is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OMGosh, what I have been looking for.
reviews.reviewText: I like a thong back but want a regular waist, not a bikini. I have been searching to no avail for quite a while and finally tried these. These panties are so very comfortable. Wash nicely but I would suggest hang to dry instead of dryer. I think they shrunk a tiny bit in the dryer. Will be ordering more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and perfect for every day wear
reviews.reviewText: I love the Hanes Women's Panties Pack! The microfiber material is super comfy and doesn't show under clothes. Great fit, coverage, and variety of colors. Affordable and durable too. Highly recommend for everyday wear! They may not be the sexiest thing out there, but they feel good under my clothes. :-)

reviews.reviewTitle: How to find things at Amazon

reviews.reviewText: Very comfy undies but absolutely no smoothing/control function at all.

reviews.reviewTitle: Holding up better than other brands
reviews.reviewText: Great fit, comfortable and holding up much better than the last kind I bought.
